title: Why Open Source Matters in 2026
author: Azvan
summary: Building community-driven software is no longer an option, it's a necessity for scalable projects.
content:
Open source is the backbone of modern technology. In 2026, we see more companies than ever contributing to and relying on open-source projects to drive innovation and maintain security.

## Community First
The power of open source lies in its community. When thousands of developers look at the same code, bugs are found faster and features are implemented more robustly.

## Cost Effectiveness
By sharing the burden of development, organizations can focus their resources on building unique value on top of solid, shared foundations.
